about_the_game:
"


Curse of the Frostbane 5e Adventure


An epic 5E adventure featuring visually striking snow /ice battlemaps for players of level 5 to
7
.
The players will journey through the Snow Mountain Range
, known as the Ingmar Hills
. They will face relentless blizzards and stumble upon a small
, nameless village
. By chance or fate , they will enter an ancient crypt and uncover the Frostbane , the ancient ice
-skeletal beings that inhabit the area . Their final , brutal encounter will bring about significant changes in the region .
This adventure includes all the assets required to play the adventure :
  • 5e Adventure for levels 5 to 7
    (adapted from the 24+ page adventure ) .
  • 9 high quality Battlemaps .
  • 4 new Stat Blocks .
  • 3 special items & weapons .
  • Tokens to represent the characters and enemies .
"
